sn1.81:1.1: “Who in the world has no conflict?
sn1.81:1.4: Who always lives as their own master?
sn1.81:2.1: To whom do mother, father, and brothers
sn1.81:2.3: Who here, though of low birth,
sn1.81:2.4: is bowed to even by aristocrats?”
sn1.81:3.1: “Ascetics have no conflict in the world.
sn1.81:3.2: The life of ascetics is not lost.
sn1.81:3.4: Ascetics always live as their own master.
sn1.81:4.2: bow to ascetics when they’re established.
sn1.81:4.3: Even though an ascetic is of low birth,
sn1.81:4.4: they’re bowed to even by aristocrats.”
sn1.81:5.5: The Linked Discourses on Deities are complete.
